name: Ice Bumper
description:
A simple 2D top-down arcade-style game where you bump ice chunks and seals into the water without getting knocked off yourself. Pressing the spacebar allows you to do a spin attack which increases the knockback of collided objects. The game ends when you fall into the water.

Controls:
  • Arrowkeys / W,A,S,D = Move
  • Spacebar = Main Menu Selection / Spin Attack
Here is some of the things you will be interacting with:
  • Ice chunks are commonly found and are the easiest for getting points and setting up combos.
  • Seals will actively try to chase and bump you, which causes you to get stunned. To prevent this, be sure to spin attack them instead.
  • Rare ice chunks, as the name implies, are rare and when they do show up, it isn't long before they disappear. They are worth a lot of points, so knock them off before they disappear!
Scoring: Ice chunk50 ptsSeal200 ptsRare ice chunk (Purple)500 pts

Points rewarded are multiplied based on the number of collisions involved in causing the object to fall into the water. As an example, bumping a seal into an ice chunk which then bumps into another ice chunk that then falls into the water will reward 50 points multiplied by three! Try stringing together a bunch of collisions that knock some thing(s) into the water!

Try to go for a high score!
